import { AccountBalance, PhotoCamera as CameraIcon } from '@material-ui/icons' import { CssBaseline, IconButton, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { Theme, WithStyles, createStyles, withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import AppBar from '@material-ui/core/AppBar' import Head from 'next/head' import LangMenu from './LangMenu' import { Link } from '@App/lib/router' import MetaTag from './MetaTag' import React from 'react' import Toolbar from '@material-ui/core/Toolbar' import { WithTranslation } from 'next-i18next' import { withTranslation } from '@App/server/i18n' const styles = (theme: Theme) => createStyles({ icon: { marginRight: theme.spacing(2), color: '#fff' }, title: { flexGrow: 1 }, footer: { backgroundColor: theme.palette.background.paper, padding: theme.spacing(6) }, loginText: { textDecoration: 'none', marginLeft: theme.spacing(1) } }) function Copyright() { return ( Copyright Â© Sec Receive {' '} {new Date().getFullYear()}. ) } class Layout extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const { i18n } = this.props i18n.on('languageChanged', (lang: string) => { console.log('lang changed', lang) }) } render() { const { classes, t, i18n, children } = this.props return ( {t('title')} {t('login')} {children} {/* Footer */}
Your company
{/* End footer */} ) } } export default withTranslation('common')(withStyles(styles)(Layout))
